hero.title: Connecting the Photography Industry
hero.subtitle: Where models, photographers, and organizers meet.
hero.subtitleSecond: From photo session bookings to instant photography requests, everything is here.

features.title: ShutterHub Features
features.subtitle: A comprehensive platform that meets all the needs of the photography industry

booking.title: Photo Session Booking System
booking.description: Supporting various booking methods from first-come-first-served to lottery

instant.title: Instant Photo Request
instant.description: The Uber of photography - when you need a photo right now

platform.title: Three-Party Integrated Platform
platform.description: Models, photographers, and organizers in one place

cta.title: Start ShutterHub Now
cta.subtitle: Experience the new standard of the photography industry

footer.brand: Integrated platform connecting the photography industry

booking.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to make a reservation.
booking.sessionEnded: This photo session has already started or ended
booking.notPublished: This photo session is not published
booking.participateQuestion: Would you like to participate in this photo session?
booking.confirmBookingQuestion: Would you like to book the following photo session?
booking.confirmCancelQuestion: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?

notes.title: Notes:
notes.cancelDeadline: Cancellation is possible up to 24 hours before the start time
notes.cancelFee: Cancellation fees may apply for same-day cancellations

cancelNotes.title: About Cancellation:
cancelNotes.reBooking: Re-booking after cancellation will be first-come, first-served
cancelNotes.lateCancelFee: Cancellation fees may apply if less than 24 hours before start time

form.createDescription: Please create a new photo session
form.editDescription: Please edit the photo session information
form.titlePlaceholder: Enter the title of the photo session
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a detailed description of the photo session...
form.publishDescription: When published, other users can search and book this session.

validation.dateTimeRequired: Start time and end time are required
validation.startTimeInvalid: Start time must be after current time
validation.endTimeInvalid: End time must be after start time

list.title: Photo Sessions
list.noResults: No photo sessions found matching your search criteria.

lottery.title: Lottery Photo Session
lottery.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to participate in the lottery.
lottery.applicationMessagePlaceholder: Please write your motivation or self-introduction...
lottery.entryCompleted: Entry completed. Please wait for the lottery results.
lottery.winnerInstructions: Your participation in the photo session is confirmed. Details will be sent separately.
lottery.betterLuckNextTime: Unfortunately, you were not selected. Please try again next time.
lottery.entryNotStarted: Entry period has not started yet

notes.title: Notes
notes.fairLottery: The lottery is conducted fairly and randomly
notes.resultNotification: Lottery results will be notified after the lottery date
notes.winnerBooking: Winners will be automatically booked for the photo session
notes.noRefund: Cancellation after entry is not allowed

adminLottery.title: Admin Lottery Photo Session
adminLottery.sessionNotFound: Admin lottery photo session not found
adminLottery.adminLotteryDescription: Organizer manually selects participants from applicants
adminLottery.applicationMessagePlaceholder: Please write your motivation, self-introduction, portfolio, etc...
adminLottery.entryCompleted: Application completed. Please wait for the selection results.
adminLottery.selectedInstructions: Your participation in the photo session is confirmed. Details will be sent separately.
adminLottery.betterLuckNextTime: Unfortunately, you were not selected. Please apply again next time.
adminLottery.entryNotStarted: Application period has not started yet

notes.title: Notes
notes.organizerDecision: Selection criteria are at the organizer's discretion
notes.resultNotification: Selection results will be notified after the selection deadline
notes.selectedBooking: Selected applicants will be automatically booked for the photo session
notes.noRefund: Cancellation after application is not allowed

adminLottery.startSelectionDescription: Application period has ended. Please start selecting applicants.
adminLottery.selectionNotesPlaceholder: Please write selection reasons or notes for future reference...
adminLottery.selectionLimitDescription: You can select up to {count} people.
adminLottery.noSelectionMadeDescription: Please select at least one person.

errors.title: Error
errors.sessionFull: Sorry, this photo session is full.
errors.alreadyBooked: This photo session is already booked.
errors.sessionEnded: This photo session has already ended.

success.title: Success
success.bookingCompletedDescription: Your photo session booking has been completed.
success.entryCompletedDescription: Your lottery entry has been completed.
success.lotteryCompletedDescription: The lottery has been conducted successfully.
success.selectionCompletedDescription: Selection of {count} people has been completed.

priority_booking.title: Priority Booking
priority_booking.description: Booking system based on rank and priority tickets

notice.ticket_will_be_used: â» Priority ticket will be used

priority_settings.title: Priority Booking Settings
priority_settings.description: Manage ticket priority and rank priority settings

general_booking.title: General Booking Start Time
general_booking.description: Time when all users can start booking

ticket_priority.title: Priority Ticket Feature
ticket_priority.description: Early booking with priority tickets issued to specific users

rank_priority.title: Rank Priority Feature
rank_priority.description: Gradual booking start based on user rank

form.title: Join Waitlist
form.description: Join the waitlist for this fully booked photo session
form.message_placeholder: Share your enthusiasm or message here
form.message_optional: Message is optional. It will be used as reference information for the organizer.

notice.title: About Waitlist
notice.auto_promote: You will be automatically promoted when a spot becomes available
notice.deadline: Please confirm your booking within the deadline after promotion
notice.notification: You will be notified by email when promoted

waiting.title: On Waitlist
waiting.description: You are currently on the waitlist
waiting.notice: We will automatically notify you when a spot becomes available.

promotion.title: Promoted!
promotion.description: Congratulations! You have been promoted from the waitlist
promotion.expired_notice: This promotion has expired due to the deadline passing.

waitlist_settings.title: Waitlist Settings
waitlist_settings.description: Configure waitlist functionality for this photo session

basic.enabled_description: Allow participants to join the waitlist
basic.max_size_description: Set the maximum number of people who can join the waitlist

auto_promote.enabled_description: Automatically promote from waitlist when spots become available
auto_promote.deadline_hours_description: Set the deadline for promoted users to confirm their booking

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Configure notification methods for waitlist events
